verses.verse: "I have <S%H935>come<s%> into my <S%H1588>garden,<s%> my <S%H269>sister,<s%> [my] <S%H3618>bride;<s%> I have <S%H717>gathered<s%> my <S%H4753>myrrh<s%> <S%H5973>along<s%> with my <S%H1314>balsam.<s%> I have <S%H398>eaten<s%> my <S%H3293>honeycomb<s%> and my <S%H1706>honey;<s%> I have <S%H8354>drunk<s%> my <S%H3196>wine<s%> and my <S%H2461>milk.<s%> <S%H398>Eat,<s%> <S%H7453>friends;<s%> <S%H8354>Drink<s%> and <S%H7937>imbibe<s%> <S%H7937>deeply,<s%> O <S%H1730>lovers.<s%>"

"I was <S%H3463>asleep,<s%> but my <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H5782>awake.<s%> A <S%H6963>voice!<s%> My <S%H1730>beloved<s%> was <S%H1849>knocking:<s%> <S%H6605>'Open<s%> to me, my <S%H269>sister,<s%> my <S%H7474>darling,<s%> My <S%H3123>dove,<s%> my <S%H8535>perfect<s%> <S%H8535>one!<s%> For my <S%H7218>head<s%> is <S%H4390>drenched<s%> with <S%H2919>dew,<s%> My <S%H6977>locks<s%> with the <S%H7447>damp<s%> of the <S%H3915>night.<s%>'

"I have <S%H6584>taken<s%> <S%H6584>off<s%> my <S%H3801>dress,<s%> <S%H9010>How<s%> can I <S%H3847>put<s%> it on [again?] I have <S%H7364>washed<s%> my <S%H7272>feet,<s%> <S%H9010>How<s%> can I <S%H2936>dirty<s%> them [again?]
"My <S%H1730>beloved<s%> <S%H7971>extended<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H4480>through<s%> the <S%H2356>opening,<s%> And my <S%H4578>feelings<s%> were <S%H1993>aroused<s%> for him.

"I <S%H6965>arose<s%> to <S%H6605>open<s%> to my <S%H1730>beloved;<s%> And my <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H5197>dripped<s%> with <S%H4753>myrrh,<s%> And my <S%H676>fingers<s%> with <S%H5674>liquid<s%> <S%H4753>myrrh,<s%> On the <S%H3709>handles<s%> of the <S%H4514>bolt.<s%>

"I <S%H6605>opened<s%> to my <S%H1730>beloved,<s%> But my <S%H1730>beloved<s%> had <S%H2559>turned<s%> <S%H2559>away<s%> [and] had <S%H5674>gone!<s%> My <S%H5315>heart<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out [to him] as he <S%H1696>spoke.<s%> I <S%H1245>searched<s%> for him, but I did not <S%H4672>find<s%> him; I <S%H7121>called<s%> him, but he did not <S%H6030>answer<s%> me.

"The watchmen who <S%H5437>make<s%> the <S%H5437>rounds<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> me, They <S%H5221>struck<s%> me [and] <S%H6481>wounded<s%> me; The <S%H8104>guardsmen<s%> of the <S%H2346>walls<s%> <S%H5375>took<s%> away my <S%H7289>shawl<s%> from me.

"I <S%H7650>adjure<s%> you, O <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> you <S%H4672>find<s%> my <S%H1730>beloved,<s%> As to <S%H4100>what<s%> you will <S%H5046>tell<s%> him: For I am <S%H2470>lovesick.<s%> <S%H160><s%>"

<S%H4100>"What<s%> kind of <S%H1730>beloved<s%> is your <S%H1730>beloved,<s%> O most <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> among <S%H802>women<s%>? <S%H4100>What<s%> kind of <S%H1730>beloved<s%> is your <S%H1730>beloved,<s%> That <S%H3602>thus<s%> you <S%H7650>adjure<s%> us?"

"His <S%H7218>head<s%> is [like] <S%H3800>gold,<s%> <S%H6337>pure<s%> <S%H6337>gold;<s%> His <S%H6977>locks<s%> are [like] <S%H8534>clusters<s%> of <S%H8534>dates,<s%> [And] <S%H7838>black<s%> as a <S%H6158>raven.<s%>

"His <S%H3895>cheeks<s%> are like a <S%H6170>bed<s%> of <S%H1314>balsam,<s%> <S%H4026>Banks<s%> of sweet-scented <S%H4840>herbs;<s%> His <S%H8193>lips<s%> are <S%H7799>lilies,<s%> <S%H5197>Dripping<s%> with <S%H5674>liquid<s%> <S%H4753>myrrh.<s%>

"His <S%H3027>hands<s%> are <S%H1551>rods<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H4390>Set<s%> with <S%H8658>beryl;<s%> His <S%H4578>abdomen<s%> is <S%H6247>carved<s%> <S%H8127>ivory<s%> <S%H5968>Inlaid<s%> with <S%H5601>sapphires.<s%>

"His <S%H7785>legs<s%> are <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of <S%H9635>alabaster<s%> <S%H3245>Set<s%> on <S%H134>pedestals<s%> of <S%H6337>pure<s%> <S%H6337>gold;<s%> His <S%H4758>appearance<s%> is like <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> <S%H977>Choice<s%> as the <S%H730>cedars.<s%>

"His <S%H2441>mouth<s%> is [full of] <S%H4477>sweetness.<s%> And he is <S%H3605>wholly<s%> <S%H4261>desirable.<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is my <S%H1730>beloved<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> is my <S%H7453>friend,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>"
